Position: Quality Assurance Analyst
Location: 3 Concorde Gate, Don Mills ON (Occasional travel to business units in the GTA)
Posting Date: Mar 1, 2004 Closing Date: Mar 8, 2004
Reporting to the National Manager, Compliance Services, this position is responsible for evaluating, monitoring, and reviewing programs, processes, claims, documentation & files to ensure compliance with internal company requirements & government regulations.
Position responsibilities: · Identifies risks/exceptions/problems, recommends action and escalates unresolved issues to Management to ensure corrective action. · Coordinates and ensures comprehensive communication between all groups including staff, WF Audit and TCC Quality Assurance. · Conducts tests on internal processes for efficiency & compliance & recommends improvements. · Participates in and/or manages projects relating to quality assurance. · Assists in the development, preparation and review of policies, procedures, training materials and other communications to ensure business units meet and maintain compliance requirements.
Knowledge, Experience, Skills · Minimum 3 years experience within a Trans Canada Credit business unit. · Demonstrated ability to problem-solve and synthesize multiple variables when supporting risk assessments. · Proven strong analytical skills with high attention to detail. · Strong organizational skills with demonstrated ability to work well independently. · Familiarity with Microsoft Office Applications required. · Supreme knowledge preferred.
Qualified candidates should contact Katherine Karbownik at 416 382-5314 or e-mail Katherine.Karbownik@tcrs.ca Don't forget the Employee Referral Award program. Do you know someone who may have the qualifications for this position? If so, talk to them about applying.
You could earn $$$$$
